channel.title: OWASP Juice Shop on Open Security Summit
channel.description: Recent content in OWASP Juice Shop on Open Security Summit

item.title: OWASP Juice Shop Cocktail Party - Ask us anything ( AUA )
item.description: This social session combines BYOC with AUA! Members of the JuiceShop team will answer all your questions, listen to your ideas, praise and complaints! As a warm-up we will present the results of the ongoing 2020 user survey with graphs and diagrams as colorful as the participants’ cocktails! Tip: There are no prerequisites for this session other than you should have at least of OWASP Juice Shop! The Bring Your Own Cocktail (BYOC) part is not mandatory to join, but it’s more fun it you actually do.

item.title: OWASP Juice Shop Deep Dive - Integration
item.description: In this practical session we will dive into the integration capabilities of OWASP Juice Shop. We’ll set up Prometheus monitoring, create a Grafana dashboard, check out practical uses of the Challenge API integration and play with the new solution webhook prototype! Tip: If you are completely new to Juice Shop, best join the “OWASP Juice Shop Introduction” training on either 2.6. or 11.6. at 17:00!

item.title: OWASP Juice Shop Deep Dive - MultiJuicer
item.description: OWASP Juice Shop is an incredible tool to learn and teach about web application security. The Juice Shop lets people attack a real(ish) web application - which looks like a normal eCommerce Shop - and learn step by step about some of the most impactful vulnerabilities. When you are running a Security Training for developers based on the Juice Shop you have one problem: How can every developer run and access his own Juice Shop Instance to train his skills?

item.title: OWASP Juice Shop Deep Dive - Theming
item.description: In this practical session we will dive into the theming capabilities of OWASP Juice Shop. We’ll not only update the shop with a new color palette, but will also customize the product inventory, some challenges, social links and more! Juice Shop can be fully tailored to your needs and doing so will for example boost immersion in awareness trainings a lot! Tip: If you are completely new to Juice Shop, best join the “OWASP Juice Shop Introduction” training on either 2.
